title: Test for table to include in a typophile post
content:
As the title says: this is the html code of a table that should be displayed correctly within a typophile thread using the allowed tag iframe.

Worked fine in the intended thread [http://www.typophile.com/node/103519](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/103519 "http://www.typophile.com/node/103519").

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [phrases.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233720/http:/typophile.com/files/phrases.html) | 1.2 KB |
author: Michel Boyer
